00029 #ifndef _error_h
00030 #include "Error.h"
00031 #endif
00032 
00035 class NoSuchPrimaryResource :public Error {
00036 public:
00037     NoSuchPrimaryResource(): Error("The primary resource given has no matching entry in the AIS database.") {}
00038 };
00039 
00041 class AISDatabaseReadFailed :public Error {
00042 public:
00043     AISDatabaseReadFailed() : Error("The AIS database read fialed.") {}
00044     AISDatabaseReadFailed(const string &msg) : 
00045     Error(string("The AIS database read failed: ") + msg) {}
00046 };
00047 
00049 class AISDatabaseWriteFailed :public Error {
00050 public:
00051     AISDatabaseWriteFailed() : Error("The AIS database write failed.") {}
00052     AISDatabaseWriteFailed(const string &msg) : 
00053     Error(string("The AIS database write failed: ") + msg) {}
00054 };
